mapper.select: with v1 as (select sms_code from uo_op_daily_template_config where group_id = #{groupId}::integer), v2 as ( select t1.sms_code, case when t1.sms_code = v1.sms_code::varchar and t1.sms_code is not null then '1' else '0' end tmp_col, sms_content, is_coupon_name, sms_name, is_product_name, is_product_url, remark, create_dt, update_dt, case when update_dt is null then create_dt else update_dt end op_dt, (date_part('day', now() - cast(create_dt as timestamp)) + 1) used_days from uo_op_sms_template t1, v1 order by tmp_col desc, op_dt desc ) select v2.* from v1, v2 limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE(SMS_CONTENT, IS_COUPON_URL, IS_COUPON_NAME, SMS_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_URL, REMARK) VALUES(#{smsContent},#{isCouponUrl},#{isCouponName}, #{smsName}, #{isProductName}, #{isProductUrl}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UO_OP_DAILY_TEMPLATE_CONFIG WHERE SMS_CODE=#{smsCode}

select t1.sms_code, sms_content, is_coupon_name, sms_name, is_product_name, is_product_url, remark, create_dt, update_dt, case when update_dt is null then create_dt else update_dt end op_dt, (date_part('day', now() - cast(create_dt as timestamp)) + 1) used_days from uo_op_sms_template t1 order by op_dt desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
